summary: This document is an email chain from November 2021 regarding follow-up on subpoena returns from AT&T related to the Epstein/Maxwell investigation. The emails discuss obtaining subscriber records and checking if certain phone tolls hit on Epstein or Maxwell numbers.

persons.name: Byrne, Paul
persons.context: Copied on an email chain regarding subpoena returns for the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: A subpoena was issued, likely for phone records from AT&T as part of the Epstein/Maxwell investigation.

keyFacts: Investigators were actively pursuing phone records via subpoena from AT&T in November 2021 related to the Epstein/Maxwell case.
A key investigative goal was to determine if certain phone tolls (calls) 'hit on any Epstein/Maxwell numbers'.
The email chain shows coordination between different parties (likely FBI, US Attorney's Office, NYPD) to obtain subscriber records that were initially not provided.
The document references an external email and attachments containing records received from AT&T.
